content: fasten off and weave in ends handles 2 fold bag flat measure off six 90 lengths of one of the colors and work with 3 strands for each handle leaving 6 to 8 length before beginning to chain hold 3 strands together and attach yarn in 9th stitch from right side of bag counting from right to left chain 50 skip 9 stitches attach chain handle in next stitch pull loop through and fasten_off tightly make an overhand knot with yarn ends around points where chain handle meets top of bag repeat on other side of bag finishing decorate as desired by stringing pony beads on strands below handles buttons or beads can be sewn on the large-stripe areas for additional decoration a fabric lining can be sewn and inserted inside bag copyright 2017 2004 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 3
